frameDefinitions: A member or members of a Class have just been  mentioned or are present in the discourse setting and now a different instance  (or group of instances) of the same class is referred to.
A Competition comes to an end, with a Competitor tying, winning, or losing against an Opponent (or opponents) according to their Score.
A Competitor claims a Prize as a result of the outcome of their participation in a Competition.
A Shopper looks for Goods in order to purchase them.
A Player finishes a Game, possibly with an outcome of winning or losing.
A Winner has victory over an Loser.
frameExamples: My husband left me for <t>another</t> woman -- and now wants to get back together again!
Unbelievable--he <t>lost</t> the gold medal by just .02 points!
We <t>won</t> a car in the raffle.
listRoleDefinitions: The general category of entity which has been referred to.
The instance of the <fen>Class</fen> that is added to the <fen>Initial_set</fen> of entities in the <fen>Class</fen>.
The previously mentioned group of entities of the <fen>Class</fen>.
The individual involved in the <fen>Competition</fen>.
The individual that the <fen>Competitor</fen> has been competing against.
The individuals who compete against each other.
The event in which the <fen>Competitors</fen> compete with each other.
The time at which the <fen>Competition</fen> takes place.
The location at which the <fen>Competition</fen> takes place.
The individual or individuals involved in the <fen>Competition</fen>.
A socially and/or monetarily significant entity which is given to a <fen>Competitor</fen> according to <fen>Score</fen> or <fen>Rank</fen>.
When the <fen>Competition</fen> takes place.
The location where the <fen>Competition</fen> takes place.
The person who attempts to find the <fen>Goods</fen>.
This is the entity that the Ground may contain. Typically, it is expressed as a<ment>for</ment>-PP.
This role identifies the time when the shopping occurs.
A spatial setting larger than the Ground in which the Shopping event occurs.
An activity the <fen>Player</fen> participates in.
The individual participating in a <fen>Game</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Game</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Player</fen> finishes the <fen>Game</fen>.
The individual or individuals who beat the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The individual or individuals that get beat by the <fen>Winner</fen>.
When the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory over the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory <fen>Loser</fen>.
listRoleExamples: My Husband left me for another <fex>man</fex>!
A further five incursions <fex>over and above those noted for 1995</fex> took place in the first three months of 1996.
The children were shopping for gifts for their parents <fex>before Christmas</fex>.
